title: The Natural History of Schizophrenia: A Fiveyear Follow-up Study of Outcome and Prediction in a Representative Sample of Schizophrenics. Psychological Medicine Monograph Supplement 15. By Michael Shepherd, David Watt, Ian Falloon and Nigel Smeeton. (Pp. 46; illustrated; £12.00.) Cambridge University Press: Cambridge. 1989.
